name: Append to the system shell profile
description: An adversary may wish to establish persistence by executing malicious commands from the systems /etc/profile every time "any" user logs in.

data.command: sed -i "s/# Atomic Red Team was here! T1546.004//" /etc/profile

input_arguments.name: text_to_append
input_arguments.description: Text to append to the /etc/profile file
input_arguments.value: # Hello from Atomic Red Team T1546.004
